text: Yemeni protesters continue to call for the removal of President Ali Abdullah Saleh.
A car bomb explodes in southern Baghdad killing nine people and wounding at least 27 others.
Leaders of Hamas in Cairo celebrate the signing of a Palestinian reconciliation agreement.
Syrian security forces amplify the crackdown on protesters...
...by detaining over 1,000 people in the last three days.
Rwandan rebel leaders stand trial in Germany for crimes against humanity.
Prince Charles visits a Washington D.C. community garden...
...that grows food for low income residents.
